title: Champion Reveal: Aurelion Sol, the Star Forger

replies.body: It's my birthday today. Thanks for the awesome present Riot! Looks badass.
Happy birthday!
_Happy Birthday!!!_

"No matter what planet...
No matter what galaxy...
They always look up in wonder.
Some fall to their knees in worship.
Others hide behind inhibitors and towers.
But the thing they do best... is beg for mercy.
It's just... OUTRAGEOUS."
[](http://i.imgur.com/IoTTPUC.png)

{{champion:44}} {{champion:44}}
This guys rework in not too long!!!! I hope... (>'-')>{{champion:44}}
This is art  {{champion:202}}  said so

wait wait guys isn't Aurelion Sol a dragon??
if so... why doesn't he have wings?
He's an Eastern style dragon, meaning he's long and snaky and lizard, without all of the flap flap and breathing hot orange.
This is the best thing I've ever read
I'm glad to have made your world a better place

The ult though... with all the recent champs that have come out the ult seems like such a let down, I almost feel like the ult and q should be swapped around with the q maybe doing something similar to ori's shockwave if he nurtures it to full size to make a black hole the brings them all to the center of the ult. Having the ult on the q and swapping them around makes so much sense so that you can shove an assassin off into your ring. (As I was reading over the last sentence to check for errors I realized how terrible that sounds)

for a passive that is constant as that and deals that much damage, thats fuking ridiculous.
say good bye to fighting him as a melee champ

My guess is he'd be kinda squishy. If he builds tankier (like it recommends) then he's basically just going to be annoying like Zac if he builds damage. Plus he doesn't really have much in the way of damaging abilities.

Not to mention you can outplay the stars since they're kinda telegraphed. If you're about to get hit by one but can walk behind him where there's no ball, then walk back to the front (or have them just walk back past you) you've just missed an entire star-worth of damage.
I think the idea is to go RoA into Rylais, maybe liandry's or ludens. Depends on his scalings but I don't think he'll lack damage, just burst. I figure he's intended to fit into hyper carry comps.
"Depends on his SCALES" I'll show myself out.
Im so excited and impressed! The character and kit are amazing!
Can't wait to gank side lanes with a cosmic dragon =)
IF he is a jg i cant wait
He can be a jg... His q and passive are pretty useful as it seems and his e is to gank lanes. Although, he does make a pretty good mid lane mage...

So... basically Io.
So his ult is a underpowered version of Poppy's?
can he fly over{{champion:268}} ult doe?
i would say so because Azir ult crates impassable terrain for enemys and seeing as its not a direct jump over i would say he could but i might be wrong
TBH he sounds like a perfect fit for a tanky ap jg i mean he has great ways to deal damage and keep camps at bay i think ima jg him
It's Grey not Gray here in OCE. Just saying...

Oh MA GOD 

Dragon gunna rekt all of you people!

> There are a couple of ways Nidalee can ruin Aurelion Sol's day. There’s her terrifyingly pointy long-range **spears**, of course, that’ll leave the Star Forger whimpering for mercy.

She uses javelin's not spears D:
spears are javelins mate
Spears are weapons used for stabbing and throwing, javelins are strictly for throwing, they're nearly the same but they're not. Not to mention her attack is called "javelin toss".

javelin
ˈdʒav(ə)lɪn
noun
a light **_spear _** thrown in a competitive sport or as a weapon.
the athletic sport of throwing a javelin.

rekt nerd.

Yaah but javalin toss is a form of throwing a spear like weapon. Not just javalins can be thrown that way. What she throws is 100% a spear, if you look at it, it looks nothing like a javalin at all. But she does TOSS it like a javalin.

His lore kinda makes me sad, such an immensely powerful beat forced to do the bidding of his captors, even fighting other celestial beings that had existed since the universe started. I don't get how they managed to trap him though, he can create stars! He is the reason light exists! How can some fancy magic people control something so overwhelmingly powerful?

On a side note:I'm interested in seeing how you link all these champions to the league of legends part. I hope it's good, not much point in having awesome characters if the reason they are there doesn't make sense.

isn't that a bit too op...
